channel.title: 742+ adding chars! urgent!
channel.description: hey guys, so on rune-evo by default you are a man, it does give you the option to change your char/hairstyle and clothes when you speak to eva however the buttons dont open up action's, and theres no file that contains the interface for this. the reason for that is obviously because rune evo dosnt have it, so i have to implement it myself. i want to know the best way to do this, how can i add this in if rune evo dosnt support it (witch it does) and what would be the best way to get started? Any helps appreciated thanks!
